channel.title: Zero or Negative Login Size
channel.description:
I'm hosting a nice server;
Base : [PI] RuneVerfix
Just letting my forum members test it out a bit with updates I made to the source. They can't log in though. It says Zero or Negative Login Size whenever they try to. It happened before I edited anything I thought it was nothing though...
I downloaded two more sources without editing except for the port etc allowing me to connect. It says the same thing when they try to log in... They all are PI's (Don't say PI's are shit)
Please I really want to host. :s

item.title: Zero or Negative Login Size
item.dc:creator: @I_am_so_tired I am so tired
item.description:
